description: Takase Yuuki is one of the office workers in the 2nd citiy affairs department, together with http://anidb.net/ch19484 [Marufuji Izumi] and http://anidb.net/ch19485 [Minegishi Kaoruko]. She tartly banters Izumi about attracting debauchees by not wearing a bra but reacts as scared and helpless as her friend in critical situations.
name: Takase Yuuki
